column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Between 6 adults and 3 kids we spent over $250. For this price point I expect a restaurant to nail every (not just some) dish. What they were good at... Chocolate truffle cake
column2: saffron flan and vegetable paella. Also enjoyed the bacon wrapped dates. Their plating and presentations were gorgeous. Where they failed... Shrimp skewers were charred and tasted charred
column3: a different shrimp dish tasted really fishy
column5: fried calamari was extremely over done
column6: the mango sangria lacked flavor. The waitstaff was attentive and did a good job clearing our table
column7: but they did clear some tapas that we were still working on.
